title: Software Engineer
description:
We’re looking for problem solvers, innovators, and dreamers who are searching for anything but business as usual. Like us, you’re a high performer who’s an expert at your craft, constantly challenging the status quo. You value inclusivity and want to join a culture that empowers you to show up as your authentic self. You know that success hinges on commitment, that our differences make us stronger, and that the finish line is always sweeter when the whole team crosses together.
   

  

 Alteryx Designer Cloud has become a core growth engine for Alteryx. As a Software Engineer, you will contribute in the design and delivery of Designer Cloud workflows that integrate directly with leading CDWs like Databricks, Snowflake, BigQuery to perform Alteryx’s prep\\-and\\-blend operations at scale. You will be working on our inhouse workflow transformation engine in compiler, shape cross\\-package and monorepo architecture for performance, testability, and reliability, and partner with PM/UX to ship secure, high\\-quality platform capabilities.
   

  

**What You Get To Do In This Role**
* Develop and maintain scalable, responsive web components, pages, and features based on business requirements.
* Collaborate closely with design, product, and development teams to create seamless, interactive user interfaces.
* Contribute to frontend architecture and work with a variety of web technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React, HTML, CSS, and Material UI.
* Work within a Design System to ensure consistency and quality across projects.
* Debug, troubleshoot, and ensure quality standards across frontend components.
* Actively participate in code reviews and contribute to best practices across the development team.
* Stay updated on new tools, frameworks, and best practices in frontend development.
* Work on some really exciting problem statements related to AI, cloud data platforms, nx/js, WebAssembly


**What You Should Have For This Role**
* 2\\+ years of experience in frontend development with expertise in at least one framework like React, Angular, Svelte, or Vue.js along with a good understanding of Vanilla JavaScript.
* Proficiency with CSS, HTML, and responsive design principles.
* Exposure to TypeScript and interest in building robust, type\\-safe applications.
* Familiarity with frontend build and deployment pipelines (e.g., Webpack, Docker, or similar).
* Proficient in using debugging tools and techniques.
* Basic understanding of RESTful APIs, cloud\\-based data handling, and real\\-time data communication.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and the ability to work independently as well as part of a team.
* Have a customer\\-centric mindset and would like to take on challenges irrespective of the difficulty level
* Ensure code quality and standards are maintained
* Train mentor mentor your juniors to become as good as you.


**Good To Have**
* Exposure to backend technologies like NodeJS.
* Knowledge of cloud platforms such as AWS, Databricks, or Snowflake.
* Basic understanding of Generative AI concepts.
* Hands\\-on experience with tracking tools like Google Analytics or Amplitude.


 Find yourself checking a lot of these boxes but doubting whether you should apply? At Alteryx, we support a growth mindset for our associates through all stages of their careers. If you meet some of the requirements and you share our values, we encourage you to apply. As part of our ongoing commitment to a diverse, equitable, and inclusive workplace, we’re invested in building teams with a wide variety of backgrounds, identities, and experiences.
   

  

 This position involves access to software/technology that is subject to U.S. export controls. Any job offer made will be contingent upon the applicant’s capacity to serve in compliance with U.S. export controls.

title: Web Developer Intern
description:
Web Developer Intern (Paid)
 



 Company: ZenithByte
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Duration: 3 Months
 



 Application Deadline: 29th December 2025
 



 Opportunity: Full\\-time role based on performance \\+ Certificate of Internship
 



  





 About ZenithByte
 



 ZenithByte provides students and graduates with practical, hands\\-on experience in web development. We aim to empower aspiring developers by offering real\\-world, client\\-based projects that strengthen technical skills and build professional portfolios. Our mission is to bridge the gap between theoretical learning and industry\\-ready expertise.
 



  





 Responsibilities
 



 Assist in designing and developing responsive, user\\-friendly websites.
 



 Work with front\\-end and back\\-end frameworks to develop dynamic web applications.
 



 Test, debug, and optimize code for performance and seamless user experience.
 



 Collaborate with senior developers and designers on live projects.
 



 Learn and apply modern tools and technologies to improve development efficiency.
 



  





 Requirements
 



 Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
 



 Familiarity with frameworks like React, Angular, or Node.js (preferred).
 



 Basic knowledge of UI/UX principles and responsive design concepts.
 



 Strong communication, teamwork, and time\\-management skills.
 



 Passion for learning and building creative, functional web solutions.
 



  





 Stipend \\& Benefits
 



 Stipend: ₹7,500 \\- ₹15,000 (Performance\\-Based) (Paid)
 



 Hands\\-on experience with real\\-world web development projects.
 



 Certificate of Internship \\& Letter of Recommendation upon completion.
 



 Opportunity to build a strong professional portfolio with live project exposure.
 



  





 Equal Opportunity Statement
 



 ZenithByte is an equal\\-opportunity employer. We welcome applicants from all backgrounds and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive work environment.

title: Principal Engineer
description:
A Principal engineer at Razorpay is well\\-grounded \\- innovative, quality focussed, product thinker, business conscious \\- not mere coders, of course, with deeper technical context and experience to build quality software. You should be able to see nuances and elements that others might not. Engineering creates a significant impact across different areas, considering the scale of our software product outreach. You’re expected to be involved in almost every project and also influence the culture of the company and help shape it in the right way.
 



**Roles and Responsibilities:** 



* Drive the technology and engineering best practices on different fronts like quality, performance, design, and operations at the organizational level
* Responsible for design, architecture, and delivery of a feature or component/product with the highest quality with high\\-level directions from architects
* Drive technology innovations \\& remaining ahead of the curve
* Collaborate effectively with cross\\-functional teams to deliver end\\-to\\-end products \\& features
* Demonstrate ability to multi\\-task and re\\-prioritize responsibilities based on changing requirements
* Estimate efforts, identify risks, devices and meets project schedules
* Runs review meetings effectively and drives the closure of all open issues on time
* Provide functional, design, and code reviews in related areas of expertise within team and cross\\-team.
* Mentor/coach engineers to facilitate their development and provide technical leadership to them
* Rise above detail to see broader issues and implications for the whole product/team \\& Implement a long\\-term technology vision for your organization \\& team
* Contribute to streamlining hiring challenges and helping hire high\\-quality engineers for the organization
* Represent organization and team in external \\& internal forums, respectively



**Mandatory Qualifications:** 



* 12\\+ years of strong design/development experience in building massively large\\-scale distributed internet systems and products
* Deep expertise in more than one programming language and tech stack to write maintainable, scalable, unit\\-tested code
* Experience leading \\& mentoring project teams
* Strong Object\\-oriented skills, knowledge of design patterns, and uncanny ability to design intuitive modules and class\\-level interfaces.
* Deep understanding of data\\-driven web application design and development
* Superior organization, communication, interpersonal, and leadership skills
* Must be a proven performer and team player that enjoys challenging assignments in a high\\-energy, fast\\-growing, and start\\-up workplace
* Must be a self\\-starter who can work well with minimal guidance and in a fluid environment
* Must be excited by challenges surrounding the development of massively scalable \\& distributed system
* Agility and ability to adapt quickly to changing requirements and scope and priorities
* The experience of having been a software engineer for at least 12 years.
* Have a few weekend side projects up on GitHub
* Have contributed to an open\\-source project
* Have worked at a product company
* Have a working knowledge of a backend programming language



**Location:** 
 Bangalore

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
We are seeking a Senior Full\\-Stack Engineer . You will be responsible for building, scaling, and maintaining IP platform.
 



  





**What You Will Do**




 ● Design, develop, deploy, and maintain full\\-stack web applications and automations
 



 ● Build and maintain backend services, APIs, and integrations with internal and external systems
 



 ● Develop scalable front\\-end interfaces in collaboration with UI/UX stakeholders
 



 ● Embed AI capabilities into workflows and automation processes
 



 ● Contribute to and improve our Python and/or C\\# codebases
 



 ● Ensure high standards for system reliability, performance, and security
 



 ● Participate in system design discussions and architectural decisions
 



 ● Write and review RFDs (Requests for Discussion) and technical documentation
 



 ● Mentor team members and contribute to engineering best practices
 



 ● Collaborate closely with internal intellectual property experts
 



  





**What You Bring**




 ● Proven experience as a full\\-stack software engineer delivering web applications and APIs
 



 ● Strong backend development experience using C\\# \\& Python, or another statically typed language (Java, C\\+\\+, Rust, etc.)
 



 ● Solid front\\-end experience with JavaScript/TypeScript and modern frameworks (React, Vue, Svelte, etc.)
 



 ● Experience working with SQL databases and data modeling
 



 ● Strong understanding of HTTP APIs, integrations, and distributed systems
 



 ● Hands\\-on experience with testing, version control (Git/GitHub), and code reviews
 



 ● Experience with Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
 



 ● Knowledge of secure coding practices, cryptography, and OWASP guidelines
 



 ● Strong fundamentals in algorithms, data structures, and system design
 



 ● Comfortable working in fast\\-paced, product\\-focused environments
 



 ● Clear and confident communication skills in English
 



  





  





 Experience: 7\\+ years
 



 Location: Bangalore
 



 Work Module: Hybrid
 



  





 \\#.net\\#react\\#python\\#AI\\#artificial intelligence\\#Full stack

title: Lead Software Development Engineer
description:
Razorpay is one of India’s leading full\\-stack financial technology companies, powering the way businesses move, manage, and grow money. Founded in 2014 by Harshil Mathur and Shashank Kumar with a simple vision — to simplify payments for Indian businesses — we’ve since grown into a fintech powerhouse driving India’s digital payment revolution.
   

  

 Razorpay powers millions of businesses with a smarter, scalable stack that goes beyond transactions to help them truly build and grow.
   

  

 From seamless checkouts to payroll automation, across India, Singapore, and Malaysia, we’ve been engineering a fintech ecosystem that’s redefining how money moves across Asia — and we’re just getting started.
   

  

 Today, that ecosystem supports everyone from early\\-stage startups to some of India’s largest enterprises, enabling them to accept, process, and disburse payments at scale while expanding into new ways of managing money more efficiently.
   

  

 Our scale speaks volumes: Razorpay processes $180\\+ billion in annualized transactions, powering leading businesses like Airbnb, Facebook, WhatsApp, Airtel, CRED, BookmyShow, Zomato, Swiggy, Lenskart, Mirae Asset Capital markets, Indian Oil, National Pension Scheme — and over 100 of India’s unicorns. With strong roots in India and growing operations in Southeast Asia, we are shaping the next chapter of financial technology across the region.
   

  

 We are backed by global investors including GIC, Peak XV Partners (formerly Sequoia Capital India \\& SEA), Tiger Global, Ribbit Capital, Matrix Partners, MasterCard, and Salesforce Ventures, having raised over $740 million to date. Strategic acquisitions — including Ezetap (POS and offline payments), Curlec (Malaysia expansion), BillMe (digital invoicing), and POP (rewards\\-first UPI) — along with earlier moves in fraud prevention, payroll, and lending, have further strengthened our platform and widened our footprint across Asia.
   

  

 But what truly sets Razorpay apart is our culture. At Razorpay, ownership is our oxygen — you own what you build, with no micromanagement or red tape, just the runway to make your ideas fly. Learning is a lifestyle — if you’re curious, you’ll feel at home here. People \\> Pedigree — we hire for attitude, hustle, and hunger more than degrees. Transparency thrives over titles — this is where interns question CXOs and CXOs say “thank you.” Guided by our values of Customer First, Autonomy \\& Ownership, Agility with Integrity, Transparency, Challenging the status quo and a strong belief that Razorpay grows with Razors, you’ll be part of a 3000\\+ strong team building not just products, but the financial infrastructure of the future.
   

  

**The Role**
 A lead software development engineer at Razorpay is well\\-grounded \\- innovative, quality focussed, product thinker, and business conscious \\- not mere coders, of course, with deeper technical context and experience to build quality software. You should be able to see nuances and elements that others might not. Engineering creates a significant impact across different areas, considering the scale of our software product outreach. You’re also expected to influence the culture of the company and help shape it in the right way.
   

  

**Roles And Responsibilities**
* Be involved and drive product \\& design discussions.
* Help us scale our payment infrastructure to get every Indian to pay online.
* Help us make decisions to shape our REST APIs for developers worldwide.
* Contribute to open source as we set the standards for mobile payments.
* Be involved and drive product \\& design discussions.
* And, most importantly, brainstorm and create new directions that Razorpay can take in our quest to make online payments easy and accessible to all.


**Mandatory Qualifications**
* 5\\+ years of experience in Technology.
* A strong product design sense.
* Good experience in working with any of the programming languages like PHP, Python, Django, Golang, Java, C\\+\\+
* Understand end\\-user requirements, formulate use cases and come up with effective solutions.
* Good understanding of REST APIs and the web in general.
* Ability to build a feature from scratch \\& drive it to completion.
* A willingness to learn new technology, whatever lets you deliver the best product.
* Have a few weekend side projects up on GitHub.
* Have contributed to an open\\-source project.
* Have worked at a product company.
* Have a working knowledge of a backend programming language


 Razorpay believes in and follows an equal employment opportunity policy that doesn't discriminate on gender, religion, sexual orientation, colour, nationality, age, etc. We welcome interests and applications from all groups and communities across the globe.
   

  

 Follow us on LinkedIn \\& Twitter

title: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer (C#/.NET)
description:
**Business Unit:**
 Cubic Transportation Systems
   

  

**Company Details:**
 When you join Cubic, you become part of a company that creates and delivers technology solutions in transportation to make people’s lives easier by simplifying their daily journeys, and defense capabilities to help promote mission success and safety for those who serve their nation. Led by our talented teams around the world, Cubic is committed to solving global issues through innovation and service to our customers and partners.
   

  

**Job Details:**
**Job summary:** 
 A Senior Full Stack Software Engineer with experience in developing web application business logic and APIs on AWS platforms in C\\#/.NET. Knowledge of AWS IoT Hub and/or UI development frameworks preferred. Conceptualizes, designs, codes, debugs, and performs development activities in accordance with designated standards and procedures. Works closely with other engineering disciplines. This position typically works under general supervision and direction. Incumbents of this position will regularly exercise discretionary and substantial decision\\-making authority.
   

  

**Essential Job Duties and Responsibilities:**
* Using the relevant programming language and technologies, provide creative, thorough, and practical solutions to a wide range of technical problems.
* Design, develop, and test software programs following established quality standards and in accordance with internal engineering procedures, including coding, unit testing, peer reviews, and software configuration control.
* Complete high\\- and low\\-level detailed software design specifications, storyboards, and interface specifications.
* Share technical expertise within the department and other departments as requested.
* Provide support of products through conception to product delivery, including problem solving, defect maintenance, and support to customer services (which may require out\\-of\\-hours support).
* Prepare reports, manuals, procedures, and status reports.
* Provide training and guidance to other team members.
* Keeps abreast of improvements and developments within software engineering, supporting continuous improvement within engineering.
* Comply with Cubic’s values and adherence to all company policy and procedures, including compliance with the code of conduct, quality, security, and occupational health, safety, and environmental policies and procedures.
* In addition to the duties and responsibilities listed, the job holder is required to perform other duties assigned by their manager from time\\-to\\-time, as may be reasonably required of them.


**Minimum Job Requirements:**
**Qualifications**
* Bachelor's degree in Technology (B Tech) or Bachelor's in Engineering in a relevant discipline.
* Five (5\\)\\+ years of relevant experience or a Master's in Computer Application (MCA), specialization in software engineering, with three (3 years’ experience.


**Skills, Knowledge, And Experience**
 Essential:
   

  

* Proficient modern C\\# / .NET development experience.
* Proficient in AWS Cloud development for core business logic and APIs
* Proficient in AWS IoT Hub and/or UI development (React Native) frameworks preferred.
* Experience in production\\-grade software engineering with a proven track record of specification, design, and development, emphasizing the need for robust, secure, maintainable code.
* Delivered highly functional, performance\\-driven applications.
* Experience in developing multi\\-threaded applications.
* Experience in debugging on target platforms (C\\# / .NET, Linux).
* Experience in troubleshooting and debugging applications.
* Experience in Object\\-Oriented Design and implementation, with Software Design patterns.
* Ability to contribute to the development of application architecture.
* Experience in maintaining and improving coding standards.
* Able to build reusable code and libraries, ensuring thorough application documentation for future use.
* Experience writing simulators and test harnesses.
* Experience in software best practices such as Automated Testing, Continuous Integration, Test Driven Development, SOLID, and Clean Code principles.
* Scrum or Kanban experience.
* Jira, GIT, Jenkins, and Terraform experience.


**Personal Qualities**
* Ability to work as part of a team towards individual and shared goals; a team player in a cross\\-functional environment.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to communicate effectively at all levels.
* Demonstrates excellent interpersonal skills with a willingness to share knowledge, coach, and collaborate effectively with individuals and other departments.
* Diligent, with attention to detail.
* Able to solve problems and find effective and timely resolutions.
* Self\\-motivated with the ability to work on own initiatives and under pressure.
* Able to prioritize work, complete multiple tasks, and work under deadline and budget guidelines.
* May be required to travel domestically and internationally from time to time, and to work out of normal hours to collaborate within a geographically dispersed team.


**Worker Type:**
 Employee

title: Full Stack Web Developer
description:
*\\*Not a suitable role for Freshers. Please only apply if you have at least 5 years of full\\-stack web development experience.* 




  





 We are looking for a highly skilled web developer with proven experience in both front\\-end and back\\-end programming.
 



 They will be required to work on projects from conception to final output with fast paced development sprints and attention to detail for a pixel perfect UI implementation.
 



  





 Responsibilities
 


* Developing front end website architecture \\& wireframes
* Designing user interactions on web pages
* Developing back\\-end website applications
* Creating servers and databases for lead generation \\& online transactions functionality
* Ensuring responsiveness of applications
* Seeing through projects from conception to finished product
* Designing and developing APIs
* Meeting both technical and client needs
* A/B testing of new website features and conversion rate optimization
* Revise, edit, proofread \\& optimize web content
* Own various design tasks involved in the web development life cycle from start to finish



  





 Qualifications
 


* Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science
* Minimum 5 years’ experience in software development.
* Proficiency with fundamental front\\-end languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

title: AI / ML Technical Engineer (Education must be from IIT)
description:
**Company Description**

 Founded in 2022, T3 is a boutique consultancy specializing in Financial Regulation, AI Adoption \\& Responsible AI, and Change Management. Led by experienced senior executives, T3 collaborates with global organizations to address compliance demands, manage AI risks, and drive innovation. Our tailored strategies transform regulatory challenges into opportunities for growth, with a focus on delivering value. As a women\\-owned business, T3 is Cyber Essential certified, a TechZero pledger, and an active member of the Ellen MacArthur Foundation community. We prioritize building competitive and compliant solutions for our clients in an evolving regulatory landscape.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time, remote position for an AI/ML Technical Engineer. The role involves designing and implementing machine learning models, conducting in\\-depth statistical analysis, developing and optimizing algorithms, and applying neural networks to solve complex challenges. You will also work closely with cross\\-functional teams to build innovative solutions and ensure alignment with T3’s mission to drive compliance and innovation through responsible AI practices.
   




**Qualifications**
* Solid knowledge of Statistics, Pattern Recognition, and advanced problem\\-solving skills.
* Expertise in Computer Science concepts, including Algorithms and software engineering principles.
* Experience with advanced AI/ML topics such as Neural Networks and their applications.
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, or related field from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT).
* Strong ability to work effectively in a remote, collaborative, and multidisciplinary environment.
* Excellent analytical skills and a commitment to delivering innovative solutions aligned with business needs.
* Familiarity with ethical AI practices and compliance frameworks is a plus.

title: Lead Software Engineer
description:
We’re looking for problem solvers, innovators, and dreamers who are searching for anything but business as usual. Like us, you’re a high performer who’s an expert at your craft, constantly challenging the status quo. You value inclusivity and want to join a culture that empowers you to show up as your authentic self. You know that success hinges on commitment, that our differences make us stronger, and that the finish line is always sweeter when the whole team crosses together.
   

  

 Alteryx Designer Cloud is a key growth driver for Alteryx, enabling data preparation and blending at scale. As a Technical Leader, you will lead the design and delivery of Designer Cloud workflows that integrate seamlessly with leading cloud data warehouses (CDWs) such as Databricks, Snowflake, and BigQuery.
   

  

 You will guide the development of our in\\-house workflow transformation engine, shape cross\\-package and monorepo architectures for performance and reliability, and collaborate closely with PM and UX teams to deliver secure, high\\-quality platform capabilities. This role requires a strong technical foundation, leadership skills, and a passion for innovation.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Design and implement web components, templates, and workflows based on business requirements.
* Collaborate with Engineering Managers and Architects to develop enterprise\\-grade software solutions.
* Partner with the UX Design team to influence and align technical designs.
* Develop across the full web stack – JavaScript, TypeScript, React, HTML, CSS, Node.js, Material UI, and Design Systems.
* Drive the design and enhancement of new and existing product features, contributing to product strategy and innovation.
* Work on challenging problems involving AI, cloud data platforms, NX/JS, and WebAssembly.


**What You’ll Bring**
* 7\\+ years of experience building modern front\\-end applications using React, Redux, Jest, Material UI, and Design Systems.
* Proficiency in Node.js and TypeScript.
* Strong knowledge of Microfrontend architecture, Monorepos, and styled\\-components.
* Proven ability to design and communicate complex system architectures.
* Experience with deployment pipelines (Docker, GitLab CI/CD) and build tools (Webpack, Babel, Rsbuild).
* Familiarity with tracking tools such as Google Analytics or Amplitude.
* Ability to plan, estimate, and collaborate effectively with PMs and designers.
* Experience leading and mentoring front\\-end/UI development teams while contributing hands\\-on.
* Commitment to maintaining high code quality standards and ensuring timely project delivery.
* Experience in compliance with information security and organizational standards.


**Nice to Have**
* Knowledge of real\\-time data communication.
* Basic understanding of Generative AI.
* Familiarity with cloud data platforms like Databricks and Snowflake.


 Find yourself checking a lot of these boxes but doubting whether you should apply? At Alteryx, we support a growth mindset for our associates through all stages of their careers. If you meet some of the requirements and you share our values, we encourage you to apply. As part of our ongoing commitment to a diverse, equitable, and inclusive workplace, we’re invested in building teams with a wide variety of backgrounds, identities, and experiences.
   

  

 This position involves access to software/technology that is subject to U.S. export controls. Any job offer made will be contingent upon the applicant’s capacity to serve in compliance with U.S. export controls.

title: Principal Software Engineer
description:
At ABB, we help industries outrun \\- leaner and cleaner. Here, progress is an expectation \\- for you, your team, and the world. As a global market leader, we’ll give you what you need to make it happen. It won’t always be easy, growing takes grit. But at ABB, you’ll never run alone. Run what runs the world.
   

  

 This Position reports to:
   

  

 Digital Solution Engineering Manager
   

  

  

  

  

  

**What We Believe In**
 ABB’s Process Automation business area enables customers to operate some of the world’s largest and most complex industrial infrastructures, helping them outrun – leaner and cleaner.
   

  

 We offer a broad range of automation, electrification and digital solutions for process, hybrid and maritime industries, including industry\\-specific integrated control and software as well as measurement and analytics solutions and services.
   

  

  

**Your Role And Responsibilities**
 The Lead (QE) for PA Core will serve as a dynamic techno\\-functional leader dedicated to enhancing the Quality Engineering framework across DataOps, Edge, Visualization, Packaging, and IAM within ABB Genix. The role is accountable for shaping automation\\-first practices, embedding QE in CI/CD pipelines, and ensuring governance and reusability across platform and customer project validations.
   

  

 This position requires both technical depth and leadership capability – guiding teams, cross\\-functional stakeholders, and ensuring that PA Core QE becomes the foundation of trust for Genix APM and customer solutions.
   

  

 The work model for the role is: Hybrid
   

  

**You will be mainly accountable for:**
* Define and own the QE strategy across PA Core areas (DataOps, Edge, Visualization, Packaging, IAM) while establishing governance for functional, non\\-functional, and regression coverage.
* Implement the adoption of automation\\-first and shift\\-left practices, embedding CI/CD\\-integrated testing and continuous quality validation.
* Coordinate the development and recycling of Golden Test Packs and acceptance packs, working with Platform, APM, and Domain teams to align QE outcomes with business KPIs.
* Mentor QE engineers to build a high\\-performance, specialist\\-driven culture while ensuring compliance, security, and performance baselines are validated and measurable.


**Qualifications for the role:**
- 15\\+ years of experience in Quality Engineering, including 3–5 years in a lead or architect role.

- Demonstrated experience in platform/IIoT or industrial software solutions, ABB, Honeywell, AspenTech, GE Digital.

- Demonstrated knowledge in creating testing strategies, ensuring quality governance, developing automation frameworks, and establishing teams focused on quality engineering.

- Comprehensive knowledge of CI/CD integration using tools such as Azure DevOps, Jenkins, and GitHub Actions.

- Practical involvement with automation tools and validation frameworks (PyTest, Playwright, JMeter, SQL/KQL) along with comprehension of industrial data flows (DataOps, Edge, OT/IT adapters, IAM security).

- Knowledge of security and compliance standards, combined with effective leadership and cross\\-functional collaboration skills to engage senior stakeholders.

 Delivered measurable outcomes including \\>90% QE automation coverage, 100% governance adoption, \\<3% defect leakage, higher first\\-time\\-right percentages, and consistent on\\-time release certification.
   

  

  

**More About Us**
 Our R\\&D engineers and scientists develop breakthrough technologies and products that change the way the world works and industries do business. We consistently explore new boundaries in technology, while retaining our focus on delivering solid returns for our customers and shareholders
   

  

 We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe.
   

  

**Fraud Warning:** 
 Any genuine offer from ABB will always be preceded by a formal application and interview process.
   

  

 We never ask for money from job applicants.
   

  

 For current open positions you can visit our career website https://global.abb/group/en/careers and apply.
   

  

 Please refer to detailed recruitment fraud caution notice using the link https://global.abb/group/en/careers/how\\-to\\-apply/fraud\\-warning.
